description:
With the DATEV SmartVerify application, you control transaction processes in DATEV online applications. Authorized by the DATEV SmartCard or DATEV mIDentity, you can approve or reject transactions.

With the DATEV SmartVerify application, you control transaction processes in DATEV online applications. Authenticated by the DATEV SmartCard or DATEV mIDentity, you can approve or reject transactions. The scope of functions is determined by the respective online application. Communication between the online application and the user is conducted via end-to-end encryption.
